name: EasyYoga
0:
”Alexa, open Easy Yoga.”
”Alexa, ask Easy Yoga for morning yoga.”
”Alexa, ask Easy Yoga for evening yoga.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: easy yoga
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Easy Yoga guides you through 10-15 minute audio yoga routines with an experienced teacher. Choose from a morning yoga routine, an evening yoga routine, or an energizing yoga flow.

Easy Yoga is best for fans who have a little experience with yoga already. To learn about our teacher, Annie Clarke, visit http://mindbodybowl.co.uk.

FEEDBACK
We hope you find Easy Yoga to be a delightful experience. If you have feedback or suggestions on how to make the experience more enjoyable, please contact us at info@matchbox.io.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
